name: Engineer & Tech Lead, NVIDIA
description: Building cool self-driving vehicle stuff and tech-leading a team of 3 engineers (MagLev UX SWAT).

name: Founder - niftymints.art
description:
Founded niftymints.art, a no-code smart contract automation platform. Launched in February 2022, making Web3 more accessible for digital artists by offering an intuitive, self-serve and easy-to-use web app to bulk publish NFTs to the blockchain. The initiative started as a research project [McGill University COMP 400] investigating the different UX challenges in Web3, and then quickly transformed into its own SaaS product.

Statistics (as of September '22):
8,000+ monthly active users, 5,500+ registered artists who published 350,000+ unique pieces of digital art to the blockchain.


Visit @niftymintsart on Twitter for the latest updates. Learn more about niftymints on YouTube here.

name: NVIDIA - (intern) Autonomous Vehicles
description:
Led a team of three interns while working as a full-stack software engineering intern in NVIDIA AI Infrastructure for autonomous vehicles (AV). Worked on building a web platform for visualizing time series AV data (DriveDebugger)

Learn more about MagLev here.

name: NVIDIA - AI Infrastructure intern
description: Full-stack software engineering intern in NVIDIA AI Infrastructure (MagLev)

name: Ubisoft - Tools Programmer (part-time)
description:
Member of Technology Group Atlas - a team developing custom web-based mapping software for company-wide use.
• Leading the front-end development of a prototype in Atlas which adds user-facing data export functionailities to core product.
• Improving product by solving pain points identified by user surveys, fixing existing issues and developing new solutions.

name: Ubisoft - Summer 2020 internship
description:
Worked at Ubisoft Montreal as a member of TG Atlas, a team responsible for building custom mapping software for company-wide use.
• Designed and built the website user interface for one of the most requested features of Atlas: map export.
• Increased efficiency of a proprietary feature ordering algorithm by ~30%, enhancing UI responsiveness.
• Boosted code coverage by a cumulative 6.43% with Jest unit tests, building a more reliable and maintainable codebase.
• Enforced guidelines for formatting/linting and fixed 700+ existing errors, producing more consistent code across entire project.
• Created documentation for developers and presented code walkthrough webinars for on-boarding of new members in the team.
• Hosted presentations with the team for showcasing new features and capabilities to Management.

name: Trackgit
description:
Designed and built a full-stack web application for GitHub repository analytics.
Built on a 100% serverless infrastructure in Firebase, the application helps track visitor analytics for any and all GitHub respositories.
https://trackgit.com

name: MoneyManager
description:
Built a full-stack web application for recording and monitoring personal daily finances.
Primary technologies used:
• Node.js with Firebase Cloud functions for the back-end
• Cloud Firestore for database
• ReactJS for front-end interface
(FERN stack : Google Firebase, express, react and node.js)

name: CreditSolution
description:
Built a custom web-based accounting software for Credit Unions.
Operational since 2015, currently trusted by 7 institutions, handling over 1k daily requests.
Used for recording daily cash collections, cash payments, creating/editing new accounts, generating transaction reports, etc.
Built primarily with:
  • Asp.net C# in back end
  • SQL Server 2015 for database management
  • HTML, CSS, JS, jQuery for front-end
  • SAP Crystal Reports for generating custom reports

name: The R-Squared Project
description:
Worked with a team to develop website's front and back-end architecture at The R-Squared Project
Responsible for:
• designing UI/UX layouts, building the web pages with the team, and reviewing code
• finding the most cost-effective cloud services (Google Firebase)
• deploying project through Content Delivery Networks (CloudFlare)
• cleaning and formatting raw data into JSON format for use in REST API with MongoDB database and NodeJS server

name: Real-time object detection
description:
Uses Tensorflow.js and ml5js
Proof of concept. All processing occurs locally inside browser on Javascript.
• Can detect objects in real-time with webcam with ~20fps on average desktops.
• Can detect objects in frames extracted from a selected video file.
Have paired it with video feed from a drone for potential autonomous control.

name: Timbletask
description:
A fully responsive Web Application for creating and sharing tasks online.
The program is built on ReactJS, uses Google Firebase for authentication and storing data, and is deployed on Heroku.

name: BitTalk
description:
A lightweight web-based WebRTC video chat application built with PubNub. Uses Xirsys for STUN/TURN servers.
Peer-to-peer (P2P) communication, so no servers are required for the video calls.
To use the app, choose a unique username and Sign in. No new accounts/sign up processes are required. Clicking on an item from the list of online users initiates a video calling session with the user.

name: Finance Automation
description:
Finance automation system for United Commercial Bank Ltd.
Used internally for email processing, automatic responses, handling tickets, report viewing.

name: WebPlay
description:
(Website version of WordPlay)
One-page online application for finding words from given set of characters.
'Letters' denotes the characters provided.
'Spaces' denotes the size of the word (ie. the number of characters the word should take)
Uses brute force dictionary search to compare characters and find results.

name: WordPlay
description:
WordPlay is a fun & interesting app made for all the spelling enthusiasts out there.
With WordPlay you can:
• Unscramble a scrambled word within seconds.
• Scramble a perfectly good word into random combinations.
• Test your spelling abilities with a Spelling game.
• Test your mind's word unscrambling capabilities with an Unscramble game.
Note: The source code in the GitHub repo has been extracted from the apk (JADX decompiler). This is a very old project and I have since lost the original code.

name: Nanotouch
description:
NanoTouch is an app which will help you use all the toggles you need in no time. It has been primarily based on Assistive Touch on Apple devices. Once you press the 'Activate' option it launches a panel from which you can access all the toggles.
With NanoTouch you can:
• Easily switch on/off Wifi, Bluetooth, Mobile Data, Auto-Sync.
• Adjust screen brightness and set sound volumes.
• Add apps to Favorites to have access to them anytime without having to open the App Drawer.
• Set Change Persistence(from 'Settings') to the specific toggles to make sure that other apps cannot change the toggle state once you have changed it.
Adjust the look of the panel to your own preferences from the 'Settings' option.

Note: The source code has been extracted from the apk (JADX decompiler). This is a very old project and I have since lost the original code.

name: QuikApps
description: Worked with a team to build a aidebar App for Android which allows fast access to apps.

name: Project Glucause
description:
Worked with a team of over 15 to organise and lead a campaign for raising funds for the welfare of marginalized women and children in Bangladesh.
Raised 50,000 BDT through arranging a food sale on school campus over the span of a week.
All proceeds were donated to Utsho Bangladesh
Read more

name: Teach Through Tech
description:
Led a group of 6 volunteers to teach computing fundamentals to 23 underprivileged children in Bangladesh.
Initiative by YES Alumni Bangladesh to teach underprivileged children the basics of computer use.

Read more

name: Pathfinders
description: Built a program which utilizes genetic algorithms for path-finding agents.

name: Image Classification
description: Image classification (numbers and digits) with neural networks in Neuroph.

name: Racing drone
description: Built a racing drone. 2300kv EMAX red-bottom motors on a 250mm carbon fiber frame. Capable of hitting 40mph.

name: Motion Capture
description: Motion capture with tensorflow.js and PoseNet.
